main_definition: Favorites refer to things, people, or places that are preferred or liked more than others.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In the context of music and media, favorites refer to songs, movies, books, etc., that a person enjoys most frequently or holds in high regard.
meanings_and_examples.example: My favorite song is 'Bohemian Rhapsody' by Queen.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In social relationships, favorites can refer to individuals who are held dearer than others due to their significance in one's life.
meanings_and_examples.example: John always considers his friends as his 'favorites' because they have been there for him during tough times.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In terms of user interface design, favorites often refer to a list of frequently used or highly-rated items that users can easily access and use.
meanings_and_examples.example: The top apps on my smartphone's home screen are all my 'favorites.'

meanings_and_examples.definition: In sports, favorites may refer to teams or athletes who have historically performed well and are expected to win in upcoming competitions.
meanings_and_examples.example: 'The Lakers are the favorites to win this year's NBA championship due to their strong lineup.'
